title: Crash on annotated varargs
body:
Consider the following file `Varargs.java`:

```
import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.*;

public class Varargs {

    public void format2(Object @Nullable ... a2) {
    }

}
```

Build GJF from source, then run

```
java -jar .../google-java-format/core/target/google-java-format-1.2-SNAPSHOT-all-deps.jar Varargs.java
```

The result is this stack trace:

```
% java -jar .../google-java-format/core/target/google-java-format-1.2-SNAPSHOT-all-deps.jar Varargs.java
>>>> 102: java.lang.ClassCastException: com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCAnnotatedType cannot be cast to com.sun.source.tree.ArrayTypeTree
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitToDeclare(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:2314)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitFormals(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:2250)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitMethod(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:1365)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitMethod(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:142)
	at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCMethodDecl.accept(JCTree.java:868)
	at com.sun.source.util.TreePathScanner.scan(TreePathScanner.java:72)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.scan(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:312)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.addBodyDeclarations(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:3213)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitClassDeclaration(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:1843)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitClass(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:379)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitClass(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:142)
	at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCClassDecl.accept(JCTree.java:778)
	at com.sun.source.util.TreePathScanner.scan(TreePathScanner.java:72)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.scan(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:312)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitCompilationUnit(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:351)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitCompilationUnit(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:142)
	at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCCompilationUnit.accept(JCTree.java:561)
	at com.sun.source.util.TreePathScanner.scan(TreePathScanner.java:72)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.scan(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:312)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.Formatter.format(Formatter.java:172)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.Formatter.getFormatReplacements(Formatter.java:240)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.Formatter.formatSource(Formatter.java:216)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.FormatFileCallable.call(FormatFileCallable.java:46)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.FormatFileCallable.call(FormatFileCallable.java:27)
	at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)

Varargs.java:5:26: error: java.lang.ClassCastException: com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCAnnotatedType cannot be cast to com.sun.source.tree.ArrayTypeTree
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitToDeclare(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:2314)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitFormals(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:2250)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitMethod(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:1365)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitMethod(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:142)
	at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCMethodDecl.accept(JCTree.java:868)
	at com.sun.source.util.TreePathScanner.scan(TreePathScanner.java:72)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.scan(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:312)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.addBodyDeclarations(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:3213)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitClassDeclaration(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:1843)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitClass(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:379)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitClass(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:142)
	at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCClassDecl.accept(JCTree.java:778)
	at com.sun.source.util.TreePathScanner.scan(TreePathScanner.java:72)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.scan(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:312)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitCompilationUnit(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:351)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.visitCompilationUnit(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:142)
	at com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree$JCCompilationUnit.accept(JCTree.java:561)
	at com.sun.source.util.TreePathScanner.scan(TreePathScanner.java:72)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInputAstVisitor.scan(JavaInputAstVisitor.java:312)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.Formatter.format(Formatter.java:172)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.Formatter.getFormatReplacements(Formatter.java:240)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.Formatter.formatSource(Formatter.java:216)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.FormatFileCallable.call(FormatFileCallable.java:46)
	at com.google.googlejavaformat.java.FormatFileCallable.call(FormatFileCallable.java:27)
	at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
```
